name: The Walking Killers
description:
In 2035 a zombie apocalypse occurred.  Jimmy is one of the few survivors that tries to stay alive at any cost! 

Game is currently available for windows only.

You play as Jimmy a 18 year old that did not even know how to shoot guns but now he learned and he is ready to survive!
 
Your Goal is to survive as long as possible!

Game Controls:

W - move up

S - move down

A - move left

 D - move right

 Cursor  -  Look at mouse position

Left click  -  Fire weapon

Easy to learn and start playing,  Score Features,  Non-stop Survival mode!

Game is still on early access

Instructions on how to play the game:
- Download the .zip file named The Walking Killers.zip.
- Unzip the folder.
- Open the unziped folder and lunch TheWalkingKillers!
- Have FUN!







-2018
